name: degreaser
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a substance used to remove grease (= oil or soft fat) from a surface or object: The chemical can be used as a paint stripper or degreaser.
More examplesFewer examplesHousehold cleaners in spray containers (e.g. degreasers, stain-removers, and antibacterial products) may be harmful if inhaled.Try citrus oil degreasers that are biodegradable.In your garage you might have things like epoxy glue, spark plugs, or engine degreaser. TCE, a flammable, colourless liquid, is an effective degreaser.
